StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Almost 20 years of consulting and industry experience working with senior and executive management of leading organizations on the strategy, analysis, architecture, design, implementation and resulting change management of complex and transformative business solutions. Possess excellent written, oral, and decision making skills with the ability to work well under continuous deadlines and pressure. Drive large scale projects with high collaboration, leadership and consensus. Consistently apply a high degree of proactive problem-solving skills.

PositionHistory.Title: Owner
Consultant
Manager
PositionHistory.Description: Manager for a regional consulting specializing in Business Intelligence solutions featuring SAP Business Objects and Oracle BI. Projects included designing marketing and customer data marts for a Sallie Mae private portfolio BI initiative as well as assisting with the design of a BI solution in a joint venture with several other companies lead by CACI in competition for a large DHS contract (OBIEE, Business Objects).

PositionHistory.Title: Owner
Consultant
PositionHistory.Description: * Senior Project Manager at Reliant Energy - managing the development of a customized wholesale credit structuring and valuation tool for the Commercial and Industrial markets for ERCOT and PJM products in conjunction with a Siebel 8 upgrade. (Agile, Oracle, .Net, Siebel, Livelink). ; * Project Manager on insurance implementation project for American Farmers and Ranchers Mutual Insurance which sought to migrate all lines of business (auto, property, other) to a complete Fiserv-Lombardi Teamworks 6 solution. (Agile, BPM, Lombardi) ;

PositionHistory.Title: Vice President, Strategic
PositionHistory.Description: Vice President, Strategic Initiatives Group Program/Project Manager for Strategic Initiatives group responsible for working with leadership team to identify, prioritize and plan the implementation/integration of key risk projects (Basel II ICAAP, regulatory reporting changes, etc.). Responsibilities included the coordination of technology, business, operations and other internal resources during all phases of a project. Lead senior management discussions on project progress including timeline, budget, risks and issues (Bloomberg, WSO).

PositionHistory.Title: Owner
Consultant
Change Management Consultant
PositionHistory.Description: Sponsored by the company's Dallas Regional Office to outline a strategic plan to develop solutions and support technology that would improve revenue and asset retention for the region. Partnered with local and divisional management to conduct productivity analysis and recommend improvements. Developed controls, procedures, processes, systems, and forecasting techniques to enable evaluation of sales performance on a regional level. Introduced new contact management tools and concepts to help create more technology-driven marketing campaigns and provided on-site expertise on the use of third party and internal systems applications.

PositionHistory.Title: Senior Consultant
Senior Analyst
Technology Specialist
Project Lead
PositionHistory.Description: * Project Lead responsible for infrastructure deployment of a new telecommunications platform for Capital One's investment in the telco-market with America One. Responsible for creating and maintaining environments to accommodate the new system and managing both onshore and offshore personnel. ;

PositionHistory.Title: Principal, Retail Banking

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Anna M Aguirre is a resident of Washington, DC, US. She has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 22 years. Currently she is employed as an Owner/Consultant at Triparatus Consulting, LLC. Anna has extensive knowledge of Microsoft .NET Technology, SQL, SAP Netweaver > SAP BW, Oracle, Business Objects, Sybase, Microsoft Visio, Java, Siebel, SDLC, PeopleSoft, Oracle BI EE, Microsoft Project, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, COBOL, WebSphere MQ, WebFocus, Strata, Software Development Life Cycle, SAP- Business Intelligence (BI), Rational Rose, Rational RequisitePro, Oracle Projects, Mercury Interactive WinRunner, Mercury Interactive LoadRunner, Logic Works ERwin/ERX, IBM WebSphere, FIX, DB2, C++, Agile Methodology. Anna has an extensive management experience (5.6 years) with exposure to senior management positions.
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Since 2009-02 for 7 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Manager/Consultant at Guident Technologies. Since 2007-01 for 6 months the candidate had experience at a senior management level working as a Vice President, Strategic/Consultant at Bank of New York. Since 1999-05 for 7 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Technology Specialist/Consultant at Capital One. Since 1994-12 for 48 months the candidate had experience at a senior management level working as a Principal, Retail Banking/Consultant at American Management Systems.
